attributes.additional_details: I think it should happen because it teaches kids to be safe on the road
attributes.background: I think the United Kingdom should change the driving law to 13 as it teaches kids to be safe on the road and kids will not be late to school. And it could be a chore to wash their car etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Lower the legal driving age to 13:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646170
